title: Can't override stata_path
body:
[I'm on another machine now.]

For some reason the installer couldn't find my Stata directory. I checked and it seems like the registry key in `HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\Stata15...` is missing. Nonetheless, this should be fixable by editing `.stata_kernel.conf` file. I tried:

    stata_path = C:\Program Files (x86)\Stata15\StataMP-64.exe

This is the same directory as another machine that could run `stata_kernel`. But then I got an error that the path still couldn't be found:

    [I 14:35:31.492 NotebookApp] KernelRestarter: restarting kernel (2/5), new random ports
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\runpy.py", line 193, in _run_module_as_main
        "__main__", mod_spec)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code
        exec(code, run_globals)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\__main__.py", line 4, in <module>
        IPKernelApp.launch_instance(kernel_class=StataKernel)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\traitlets\config\application.py", line 657, in launch_instance
        app.initialize(argv)
      File "<decorator-gen-124>", line 2, in initialize
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\traitlets\config\application.py", line 87, in catch_config_error
        return method(app, *args, **kwargs)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\ipykernel\kernelapp.py", line 484, in initialize
        self.init_kernel()
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\ipykernel\kernelapp.py", line 389, in init_kernel
        user_ns=self.user_ns,
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\traitlets\config\configurable.py", line 412, in instance
        inst = cls(*args, **kwargs)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\kernel.py", line 68, in __init__
        self.conf = Config()
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\config.py", line 58, in __init__
        self.raise_config_error('stata_path')
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\stata_kernel\config.py", line 122, in raise_config_error
        raise ValueError(dedent(msg))
    ValueError: stata_path option in configuration file is missing or invalid
    Refer to the documentation to see how to set it manually:    

    https://kylebarron.github.io/stata_kernel/user_guide/configuration/

Commenting out line 55 in `config.py`

    self.set('stata_path', stata_path)

helps, as `self.stata_path` was already read from the config file, but was replaced with an empty string (?) when `find_path()` cannot find the registry key.
